name: Royal University of Phnom Penh
description: Cambodia's oldest and most prestigious university, offering comprehensive programs in sciences, humanities, social sciences, and technology.

name: Institute of Technology of Cambodia
description: Leading engineering and technology university in Cambodia, specializing in STEM fields and technological innovation.

name: Royal University of Law and Economics
description: Specializes in law, economics, business administration, and social sciences with a focus on Cambodia's legal and economic development.

name: University of Health Sciences
description: Premier medical and health sciences university in Cambodia, training healthcare professionals for the nation.

name: Royal University of Agriculture
description: Specialized in agricultural sciences, environmental studies, and rural development.
